ygData.subject: Re: Mesh armor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mesh at level 8 is a pretty aggressive goal. I m rather lazy and at 10 I have but a netted veil and gloves, and that s it for mesh/woven/netted stuff. If
ygData.messageBody:
mox1@... writes:

> I am new to this list so I don't know if you guys have discussed this
> before. I am looking for Mesh armor, but I don't want to travel to Guk
> to get it. What is a good town to buy it in, and what is the normal
> price I should expect to pay. Thanks in Advance

Mesh at level 8 is a pretty aggressive goal. I'm rather lazy and at 10
I have but a netted veil and gloves, and that's it for
mesh/woven/netted stuff.

If you don't want to go to guk, you are probably best served by
Freeport which is the closest *major* human-friendly town to
Innothule, Guk, et. al.

--
Fraank 10 Lvl Monk Rodcet
Fromey 6 Lvl Hum Druid Prexus
Frake 8 Lvl Barb Shaman Rodcet
